content.text:
# 2015 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards

| network     = Multishow
| ratings     =
| previous    = 2014
| main        = Multishow Brazilian Music Awards
| next        = 2016
}}
The 2015 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () (or simply 2015 Multishow Awards) (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow 2015) was held on 1 September 2015, at the HSBC Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Singer Ivete Sangalo and actor Paulo Gustavo hosted the show.
Winners and nominees
The nominees were announced on 10 August 2015. Anitta, Ava Rocha and Luan Santana were the most awarded artists, winning two awards each. Winners are listed first and highlighted in bold.
Voted categories
The winners of the following categories were chosen by fan votes.
